CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - OCR support in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the scanning technique of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to detect potentially risky activities that may lead to data security incidents related to images in SharePoint, Teams messages, and endpoints. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The launch dates were incorrect and have now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The launch dates were incorrect and have now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists- A new forms experience to collect information
CurrentVersion.description: We are making it easier to collect information with an updated forms experience for Microsoft Lists. Forms look clean, are easy to design, can be easily shared, and respondents are able to fill them out on any device. All form responses appear immediately in your list after recipient clicks the submit button.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists- A new forms experience to collect information
OldVersion.description: We are making it easier to collect information with an updated forms experience for Microsoft Lists. Forms look clean, are easy to design, can be easily shared, and respondents are able to fill them out on any device. All form responses appear immediately in your list after recipient clicks the submit button.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced Third Party app purchase experience in Teams and Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Shipping an enhanced purchase experience in a Teams look and feel for Teams 3 party application in both Teams store and Teams Admin Center. This feature will slowly roll out, first to customers with a commerce billing account then to customer without a commerce billing account.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced Third Party app purchase experience in Teams and Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description:
Shipping
an enhanced purchase experience in a Teams look and feel for Teams 3 party
application in both Teams store and Teams Admin Center. This feature will
slowly roll out, first to customers with a commerce billing account then to
customer without a commerce billing account.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shared display mode for BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: The new shared display mode provides users the ability to extend their Teams meeting via a pop-out and view-only version of the stage onto the TV screen in BYOD meeting rooms. This mode ensures the meeting content is extended to the front of the room for others to see and provides the host the peace of mind their desktop is for their viewing only, minimizes the personal information that others in the room can see.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shared display mode for BYOD meeting rooms
OldVersion.description: The new shared display mode provides users the ability to extend their Teams meeting via a pop-out and view-only version of the stage onto the TV screen in BYOD meeting rooms. This mode ensures the meeting content is extended to the front of the room for others to see and provides the host the peace of mind their desktop is for their viewing only, minimizes the personal information that others in the room can see.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
CurrentVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
OldVersion.description: ,The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365  in Teams Chat list
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 app is available in the Teams Apps Store for Copilot licensed users. This update will make the Copilot app visible in the Teams Chat list for easy access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365  in Teams Chat list
OldVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 app is available in the Teams Apps Store for Copilot licensed users. This update will make the Copilot app visible in the Teams Chat list for easy access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint 360s
CurrentVersion.description: Empower employees to collect 360 feedback for personal growth and development.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint 360s
OldVersion.description: Empower employees to collect 360 feedback for personal growth and development.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Track usage of your frontline teams and apps in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Track usage across all your frontline teams deployed via DTAS (Deploy Teams at Scale) and frontline apps like Shifts, Tasks, Walkie Talkie in the Teams Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Track usage of your frontline teams and apps in the Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Track usage across all your frontline teams deployed via DTAS (Deploy Teams at Scale) and frontline apps like Shifts, Tasks, Walkie Talkie in the Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
OldVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Customization and preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification is getting advanced customization options: 1. Extensive Token Support which provides precise details to end users using the expanded token library. 2. DLP Exchange rule matched email attachment control to choose to include/exclude matched email as an attachment in end-user notifications. 3. Tailored Email Content to customize the sender display name and email body using HTML, markdown, or plain text. 4. Ability to preview the email notification to ensure it meets your requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
OldVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections on iOS and Android tablet
CurrentVersion.description: This adds a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva Connection users on iOS and Android tablets.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Customize organization branding in Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Customize organization branding in Edge for Business
OldVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets. Admins can control organization branding through the following policies: OrganizationColor, OrganizationLogo, OrganizationLogoOnAppIcon, OrganizationName.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
CurrentVersion.description: ,Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to set a retention period for a policy
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Introducing the ability to define how long content captured by a Communication Compliance policy is retained. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.
